What is singing?
questions.answer: Singing is the art of producing musical sounds with the voice.

questions.question: Why is singing taught in school?
questions.answer: To develop musical sense and confidence.

questions.question: Is singing an individual or group activity?
questions.answer: Singing can be both individual and group activity.

questions.question: Which body part helps control voice?
Why is breathing important in singing?
questions.answer: It helps control pitch and volume.

questions.question: What is pitch in singing?
questions.answer: Pitch is how high or low a sound is.

questions.question: What is volume in singing?
questions.answer: Volume is the loudness of sound.

questions.question: What is group singing?
questions.answer: Singing performed by many people together.

questions.question: What is choir singing?
questions.answer: Singing together in an organized group.

questions.answer: A song is a musical composition with words.

questions.question: What are lyrics?
questions.answer: The words of a song are called lyrics.

questions.answer: Rhythm is the pattern of beats in music.

questions.answer: Tune is the melody of a song.
